official_title: Congratulating John R. Kopicki, the Fannie E. Rippel Foundation, and the Schering-Plough Corporation, for receipt of certain awards.

summary.text: Congratulates John R. Kopicki, Senior Vice President of Solaris Health System, as this year's recipient of the Muhlenberg Foundation's William Augustus Muhlenberg Award; and (2) the Fannie E. Rippel Foundation and the Schering-Plough Corporation, as this year's recipients of the Muhlenberg Foundation's Lowell F. Johnson Philanthropic Award.

titles.title: Congratulating John R. Kopicki, the Fannie E. Rippel Foundation, and the Schering-Plough Corporation, for receipt of certain awards.
